heading: HR00376
0: RESOLUTION ENCOURAGING THE PHILIPPINE SPORTS COMMISSION AND THE PHILIPPINE OLYMPIC COMMITTEE: (A) TO CONSIDER SURFING AS A 'FOCUS SPORT' FOR THE 2020 TOKYO OLYMPICS; (B) TO FACILITATE THE RECOGNITION OF THE RELEVANT NATIONAL SPORTS ASSOCIATION; AND (C) TO PROVIDE ADEQUATE FUNDING FOR THE TRAINING OF OUR LOCAL SURFERS
status: Pending with the Committee on YOUTH AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT since 2016-09-27
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00376
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION ENCOURAGING THE PHILIPPINE SPORTS COMMISSION AND THE PHILIPPINE OLYMPIC COMMITTEE: (A) TO CONSIDER SURFING AS A 'FOCUS SPORT' FOR THE 2020 TOKYO OLYMPICS; (B) TO FACILITATE THE RECOGNITION OF THE RELEVANT NATIONAL SPORTS ASSOCIATION; AND (C) TO PROVIDE ADEQUATE FUNDING FOR THE TRAINING OF OUR LOCAL SURFERS

DATE FILED : 2016-09-20
